name: Krusty Krab
trivia: The Krusty Krab is a fast food restaurant located in Bikini Bottom, founded and owned by Eugene H. Krabs in Spongebob Squarepants.

name: Daily Bugle
trivia: The Daily Bugle is an American tabloid newspaper based in New York City in the Marvel universe.

name: Daily Planet
trivia: The Daily Planet is a daily newspaper of Metropolis in the DC universe.

name: Gotham Gazette
trivia: The Gotham Gazette is a metropolitan newspaper based out of Gotham City in the DC universe.

name: LexCorp
trivia: LexCorp is a conglomerate owned and run by Lex Luthor in the DC universe.

name: Oscorp
trivia: Oscorp is an American multinational corporation in the Marvel universe, led by President and CEO Norman Osborn.

name: Stark Industries
trivia: Stark Industries is an American global aerospace, defense, security and advanced technologies corporation with worldwide interests, led by Tony Stark as CEO in the Marvel universe.

name: Wayne Enterprises
trivia: Wayne Enterprises is a company in the DC universe, owned by billionaire Bruce Wayne.

name: Cyberdyne Systems
trivia: Cyberdyne Systems is the tech corporation responsible for the development of Skynet in the Terminator movies.

name: Gringotts Wizarding Bank
trivia: Gringotts Wizarding Bank is the wizarding bank in Great Britain, owned and operated by goblins in J.K. Rowling's series of novels and their film adaptations.

name: Nakatomi Corporation
trivia: Nakatomi Corporation is a multinational Japanese corporation which has a US branch headquarters located in Nakatomi Plaza in Century City, Los Angeles, attacked by German terrorists in the movie Die Hard.

name: Bluth Company
trivia: The Bluth Company is a real estate development firm founded by George Bluth in TV-show Arrested Development.

name: Central Perk
trivia: Central Perk is a coffeehouse in New York in sitcom Friends.

name: Dunder Mifflin Paper Company
trivia: Dunder Mifflin Paper Company, Inc. is a paper company in Scranton, Pennsylvania in the TV-show The Office.

name: Goliath National Bank
trivia: Goliath National Bank, the world leader in credit and banking, is the bank where Barney Stinson works in TV-show How I Met Your Mother.

name: Gray Matter Technologies
trivia: Gray Matter Technologies is a multi-billion dollar company co-founded by Walter White with his friend and fellow Caltech alumnus Elliott Schwartz in the TV-show Breaking Bad

name: Los Pollos Hermanos
trivia: Los Pollos Hermanos is a fast-food restaurant chain owned by Gustavo Fring that specializes in fried chicken and provides money-laundering and logistics for illegal activities in TV-show Breaking Bad and its spin-off Better Call Saul.

name: Madrigal Electromotive
trivia: Madrigal Electromotive is an enormous, multifaceted conglomerate headquartered in Hanover, Germany, in the TV-shows Breaking Bad and Better Call Saul.

name: Michael Scott Paper Company
trivia: The Michael Scott Paper Company, Inc. is a paper company started by Michael Scott after he quits the Dunder Mifflin Paper Company in the TV-show The Office.
